title: U.S. household expenditure on soaps and detergents 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2007 to 2008, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2011.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2007 and 2008.
Maximum Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, about 85.66 was reported at Year 2009
The lowest Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, of value 75.68 was reported at Year 2007
